text:
GoPro | Quality Assurance Engineer | Paris, France | Full time | ONSITE

Try to break our mobile software with your bare hands - then automate the process.

We are the creators of Quik for iOS and Android, the best app for creating breathtaking videos on your phone in minutes. Apple App Of the Year 2014, now 20M users.

Join the coolest GoPro Team (~30 strong) in Paris, South Pigalle (best view of Paris from our office).

Perks include free gym membership, weekly Rocket League / Overwatch tournament, GoPro cameras and accessories... -> https://gopro.com/careers/jobs/show?id=274530 // Email : jcaille [a] gopro.com
